code: @Test public void testProperty() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint result = context.getEndpoint("mock:result", MockEndpoint.class).     result.expectedBodiesReceived(CONSTANT).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Test").     result.assertIsSatisfied(). }
